text: Q7. |Let S be the counting semaphore variable S = 5 initially. Assume that no blocked processes exist in the system. The following signal (V), wait (P) operations are performed: 4 P, 6 V, 9 P, 13 V, and 14 P. The numbers of blocked processes at the end are . BASIC OPERATING SYSTEM Page 73 - Solution: 5-4+6-9+13-14 1+6-9-1= -3 semaphore value= -3 so 3 process is waiting (blocked) Answer is 3
